channel.title: Latest Cricket News, Cricket Info, Sports News Updates - NDTVSports.com
channel.description: Latest Cricket news, info, breaking news updates from around the cricketing world. From long on to long off, drives, hooks, pulls, cuts, yorkers and doosra, Sports.NDTV.com is an all-rounder in World Cricket coverage. View best photos and videos.

item.title: "Almost Like India Play With 12 Players": Former Pakistan Coach On Hardik Pandya's Impact
item.description: Former Pakistan coach Mickey Arthur praised Hardik Pandya, saying it is almost like India plays with an extra player in their lineup

item.title: "Not Looking Confident Even After Getting Set": Ex-Pakistan Captain On Virat Kohli
item.description: Former Pakistan captain Inzamam-ul-Haq said that Kohli should have a played a longer innings but he was not looking confident even after scoring 30 odd runs.
